body_html: This is due to _LRScheduler.state_dict explicitly excluding optimizer in state_dict(). https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/optim/lr_scheduler.py#L37 Including it in state_dict() fixes the problem. Before I go ahead and make the PR, is there any other concern that we should not put optimizer in state_dict()? cc: @apaszke Thanks!
